query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] IN (0, 1) AND [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Exam', 'Filming', 'MainFrame', 'PA', 'PR', 'Ref', 'RenderServer', 'Review') AND [System.AssignedTo] <> 'CCB_XR_PLL' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '临床后' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName], [System.AssignedTo] desc

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] IN (0, 1) AND [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Filming', 'MainFrame', 'PA', 'PR', 'Ref', 'RenderServer', 'Review') AND [System.State] IN ('Assigned', 'New') AND ( [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] = '' OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today ) AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] CONTAINS '[DSA_Trunk]' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '临床后' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName], [System.AssignedTo] desc

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] IN (0, 1) AND [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Filming', 'MainFrame', 'PA', 'PR', 'Ref', 'RenderServer', 'Review') AND [System.State] IN ('Assigned', 'New') AND [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] = '' AND [System.AssignedTo] <> 'CCB_XR_PLL' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '临床后' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName], [System.AssignedTo] desc

select [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and [System.CreatedDate] >= @today and not [System.NodeName] in ('SC', 'IC') order by [System.State], [System.AssignedTo], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority]
query.additionalqueryinfo: select [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and [System.State] in ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today and not [System.NodeName] in ('SC', 'IC') order by [System.State], [System.AssignedTo], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority]
